original_title: Venus Envy: The House of Venus Story
overview: A celebration of an underground movement of love, this film tells the unique story of the multi-dimensional Canadian artist collective known as "The House of Venus". From their humble beginnings throwing DIY theme parties and fashion shows, to their journey of creating world-renowned queer culture and community, we follow the members as they prepare for the 25th instalment of their performance and wearable art festival “Wiggle”.
title: Venus Envy: The House of Venus Story
